Title: Batman and Harley Quinn
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Bruce Timm (story by), James Krieg (teleplay by), Bruce Timm (teleplay by), Bob Kane (character created by: Batman), Bill Finger (character created by: Batman), Dan Jurgens (character created by: Booster Gold), Paul Dini (character created by: Harley Quinn), Bruce Timm (character created by: Harley Quinn), Marv Wolfman (Nightwing created by), George Pérez (concept created by: Nightwing), Len Wein (character created by: Swamp Thing), Bernie Wrightson (character created by: Swamp Thing)
Actors: Kevin Conroy, Melissa Rauch, Paget Brewster, Loren Lester
Plot: Batman and Nightwing are forced to team with the Joker's sometimes-girlfriend Harley Quinn to stop a global threat brought about by Poison Ivy and Jason Woodrue, the Floronic Man.
